document.full_text: a petrol bomb set off friday by a disgruntled former employee at a rural bank in a tibetan region of northwestern china's gansu province wounded 49 people, xinhua news agency and the local government said.
document.title: china bank bomb wounds 49, suspect caught
lines_and_colors: a petrol bomb set off friday by a disgruntled former employee at a rural bank in a tibetan region of northwestern china's gansu province wounded 49 people, xinhua news agency and the local government said.
